data.name: Pretty Girls Panic! PLUS
data.detailed_description:
New Title!


https://store.steampowered.com/app/2077950/


About the Game


"Ready! OK!?" Popular Arcade Game "Pretty Girls Panic!" is back with more power. Expand the area steadily and dodge enemy attacks and avoid capture. There are 40 stages in total. Conquer all stages and Complete the rescue of these Pretty Girls.

Features

Familiar "capture territory" arcade game, where you're in control of the playable character and cut out sections of the map to expand the control area. You must avoid contact with the enemy and enemy attacks. If you can secure a certain percentage of the area, you clear the stage. With each stage cleared, you unlock new characters and costumes in the gallery.

A lot of Pretty Girls

Game features 22 partner characters and stage characters. Each character is voiced. Unlock special costumes by completing each stage.

Partner Characters

Either "Yu" or "Asahi" can be your partner. Completing stages with your partner, your friendship level increases and you unlock additional costumes for your partner.
  • Yu : She has a responsible and serious personality, but she is often defenseless.
  • Asahi : Gentle and homely, she Is reliable and especially good with housework and doesn't enjoy all manners of exercise.
※All characters portrayed in this game are fictional and are over 18 years old.
※This is a game featuring pretty girl character images but there is no nudity.
※Bishoujo characters are used under official license.

data.short_description: Popular Arcade Game "Pretty Girls Panic!" is back with more power. Expand the area steadily and dodge enemy attacks and avoid capture. There are 40 stages in total. Conquer all stages and Complete the rescue of these Pretty Girls.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible video card with Pixel Shader 3.0 and Vertex Shader 3.0 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
